description: Online retail, marketplaces, and shopping platforms

questions.question: What is the expected product catalog size (number of SKUs)?
questions.why: Affects search infrastructure (simple DB vs Elasticsearch), indexing strategy, and page performance

questions.question: What payment gateways must be supported?
questions.why: Each gateway has different APIs, fees, and capabilities

questions.question: Is real-time inventory tracking required across channels?
questions.why: Determines event-driven vs polling architecture and oversell prevention strategy

questions.question: What shipping carriers and fulfillment centers will be used?
questions.why: Carrier APIs vary greatly in complexity; fulfillment affects order routing logic

questions.question: What is the returns and refunds process?
questions.why: Affects order state machine, inventory management, and accounting systems

questions.question: What traffic is expected during peak sales events (Black Friday, flash sales)?
questions.why: Flash sales require specific scaling, queue management, and inventory locking strategies

questions.question: Is this a marketplace (multiple sellers) or single-seller store?
questions.why: Marketplaces require seller onboarding, split payments, and complex commission logic

questions.question: What tax calculation service will be used?
questions.why: Sales tax compliance (Avalara, TaxJar) is complex with nexus rules

questions.question: What product recommendation/personalization is needed?
questions.why: ML-based recommendations require data pipelines and model serving infrastructure

questions.question: What analytics and reporting are needed for merchandising?
questions.why: Determines data warehouse needs and event tracking granularity
